parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: Profile ID. Can be obtained from user profile

summary.description: Count of lessons with russian word "уроков", used to display above schedule table

has_homework.description: Flag, shows, has student homework assigned for that day

parameters.description: Required. Profile ID. Can be obtained from user profile

parameters.description: Schedule item ID, can be obtained from Schedules

parameters.description: Schedule item ID, can be obtained from getSchedule method

parameters.name: mark_id
parameters.description: Mark ID. Can be obtained from Get Marks endpoint

parameters.description: Required. Profile ID. Can be obtained from user profile

parameters.description: Required. Profile ID. Can be obtained from user profile

parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: Profile ID. Can be obtained from user profile

remain.description: Remaining values to next mark value

roobjectund.description: Float, converted to string. Border value for getting next mark

value.description: Value of mark for reaching the goal

weight.description: Weight of mark for reaching target

average.description: Float, converted to string, shows average mark for period

dynamic.description: Can be UP, DOWN or NONE. Shows character of mark conversion

birth_date.description: Teacher's date of birth (I didn't saw it nonnulled)

sex.description: Teacher's gender [male/female] (I didn't saw it nonnulled)

user_id.description: Teacher's user id in system [male/female] (I didn't saw it nonnulled)

schedule_item_id.description: Schedule lesson unique ID, can be fetched with Get Lesson schedule item method

origin.description: Original value of mark in original system

five.description: Value of mark in fifth system (from 1 to 5)

hundred.description: Value of mark in hundredth values system (from 1 to 100)

grade_system_type.description: Grade system type, described by word

weight.description: Specifies how this mark will be counted in final result (e.g. if weight is 2, in final result it will be counted as 2)

comment_exists.description: Specifies, if teacher left a comment (but also you can just compare comment with empty string)

criteria.description: Should specifies mark creation creteria (but I didn't see this property nonnulled)

is_exam.description: If flag setted as true, the mark setted for exam

is_point.description: Point-Marks - marks, that will be created on special date, if teacher won'rt remove it

point_date.description: Specifies border date if mark is point-mark

description.description: Homework description, displayed under subject name in diary

comments.description: List of commentaries for homework, left by teacher

attachments.description: List of attachment, for example list of attached files or Digital Home Work

lesson_date_time.description: Datetime of lesson in schedule table

additional_materials.description: List of additional materials, for example list of attached files

is_done.description: Flag, specifies, is homework marked by user as done

comment.description: Comment for lesson, left by teacher

room_number.description: Classroom number in school where lesson takes it place

is_missed_lesson.description: Specifies, is lesson was missed by student

lesson_type.description: Specifies lesson type. Can be NORMAL (ordinary lesson in school) or ELECTRONIC (lesson is virtual, takes place in Microsoft Tems)

lesson_homeworks.description: List of homework attached to lessons

room_number.description: Number of room, where lesson takes place

room_name.description: Purpose of room, where lesson takes place

apikeyAuth.description: AuthToken, that can be obtained with selenium or with other methods
apikeyAuth.name: Auth-Token
